name: Slug Buddies
description:
Version 1.1.0 released!

The blue and purple Slug can now jump individually to dodge the enemy's attack!

Slug Buddies - Double-slug action!

Play as a blue and purple Slug and test your jumping skills to see how many enemies you can defeat!

Instructions:

  • When it's the blue Slug's turn, time a press of the X key just before it lands on the enemy to deal damage.
  • When it's the purple Slug's turn, time a press of the Z key instead of the X key.
  • When it's the enemy's turn, dodge its attack by pressing the X key or the Z key to make the blue Slug or the purple Slug jump, respectively.
  • If a Slug touches spikes, it'll take damage. Both of your Slugs share a total of 3 hit points; if you take three hits, both Slugs pop and the game is over!
  • Each enemy you defeat earns you 1 point; your score is displayed in the top left corner of the screen. Find out how many points you can earn!
  • Press P to pause/unpause the game. Press M to mute/unmute the music.

Note: This is a VERY primitive demonstration, so please don't expect anything especially interesting. I'm just glad I found the motivation to finish this...

Credits
  • Game programmed in Unity by ThePowerPlayer
  • All graphics drawn by ThePowerPlayer
  • Original song "Slug Buddies Theme" composed by ThePowerPlayer
